effect.diamond_pearl: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.platinum: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.platinum: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.
flavor_text.platinum: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.
